synopsis.text: Gainax Fukushima presents an inspiring tale set in the heart of Minamisōma, a city in Fukushima prefecture, as part of the 'Innovation Coast' initiative to rejuvenate the region after the tragic events of the 2011 earthquake and tsunami. "Rescue Academia" follows the journey of a struggling protagonist who finds solace and camaraderie in an unexpected friendship with a robot while engaged in local rescue efforts. As they navigate through thrilling rescue missions, a group of young friends unites, discovering their potential and forming unbreakable bonds. Delight in the unique charm of Minamisōma as the story beautifully weaves in local traditional crafts such as Ōborisōmayaki pottery. Join the adventure and witness the power of friendship and growth in the face of adversity.
